prompt: Create a landing page for a mern stack developer, use dark theme
refinedPrompt: Design and develop a visually appealing dark-themed landing page for a MERN stack developer's portfolio. Include sections highlighting their skills in MongoDB, Express.js, React, and Node.js. Showcase their top projects with brief descriptions and links to live demos or repositories. Incorporate a sleek, modern design with easy navigation. Optimize the page for fast loading and responsiveness across devices.
